name: Proof_342 — Midday Rest During Heat Exposure MaMeeFarm | DGCP™
description:
This proof documents a midday rest period at MaMeeFarm, recorded on 16 December 2025 at 12:58 PM (GMT+7).

The image shows MaMee resting inside a simple bamboo shelter surrounded by farm tools, water containers, and vegetation. This pause in activity occurs during a period of increased daytime heat, following morning farm labor including water pumping and animal care.

The structure provides basic shade without mechanical cooling or climate control. This rest period represents a necessary physiological response to environmental conditions rather than inactivity or idleness.

Within real-world farming operations, rest is an essential component of labor sustainability, particularly under heat stress. This record captures the human dimension of farm operations as part of the DGCP real-work data system.

The image is recorded as-is, with a visible timestamp embedded, ensuring temporal traceability and continuity within MaMeeFarm’s daily operational archive.
